Not sure how relevant this is but according to most sources the first American soldier to die in Vietnam was an OSS officer named Lt. Col. Peter Dewey (US Army). He was shot and killed on September 26, 1945 at a Vietminh roadblock. Because they thought he was French. Of course at that time it was known as Indochina.
